document_data.caption: A map of the Pirate Isles showing the Jaws in the southwest corner.
document_data.name: Jaws
document_data.region: The [[Pirate Isles]], the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]
document_data.mainbody: '''The Jaws''', or the '''Jaws Strait''', was a small straight found within the [[Pirate  Isles]] on the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
document_data.Geography: The Jaws sat just south of [[Dragonisle]] in the shadow of the [[Earthspur]], connecting the outer Sea of Fallen Stars in the west with the inner southwest region of the Pirate Isles near the islands of [[Teltar]] and [[Sarr]].
